summary: A unfaithful wife plots with her lover to kill her husband, but the lover is accidentally killed instead. The husband stays in hiding, and lets his wife be charged with conspiracy.
cast: Brian Donlevy|Ella Raines|Charles Coburn|Helen Walker|Anna May Wong|Robert Warwick|Clarence Kolb|Art Baker|William Wright|Mae Marsh|Sheilah Graham|Tony Barrett|Philip Ahn|Glen Vernon|Linda Leighton|Jason Robards Sr.|Erskine Sanford|Ruth Robinson|Lucius Cook|Tom Greenway|Ben Welden|Hans Herbert|Joel Friedkin|Joe Kirk|William Ruhl|Mary Landa|Harry Cheshire|Phil Arnold|Gertrude Astor|Edward Biby|James Carlisle|Martin Cichy|Mike Donovan|Martin Doric|Charles Ferguson|Sam Finn|Kay Garrett|Dick Gordon|Sherry Hall|Stuart Hall|Sam Harris|Arthur Hecht|Thomas Browne Henry|Stuart Holmes|Wilbur Mack|Thomas Martin|Harold Miller|William J. title: Impacto
